p: Grade 3 essential oils show a% reduction in monoterpens (α-pinene, camphene, β-pinene and δ-3-carene) in three cultivars, while at the same time the content in % of sesquiterpenes (β-elemene, β-eudesmene, γ-cadinene) is increased. The highest percentage was recorded for α-pinene. Table 2 shows the results.
